message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
You wanted to split it evenly, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're right, I was being a bit greedy, but I'm still not giving up on getting the better deal!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and give you a 50/50 split.
I'm not willing to split it 50/50, but I'm willing to give you a slightly higher amount this time.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my last offer.
